snippet.title: Grill on Wheels v1.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
🔥 Grill on Wheels v1.0 is Here! 🔥

https://liminagames.com/gow_oculus

Dear Grillers,

We’re thrilled to announce that the long-awaited v1.0 update of Grill on Wheels is finally here! This is more than just an update—it’s a complete overhaul that takes your grilling experience to the next level. From the food trucks to the pizza ovens, we’ve refactored the entire game’s art, polished every detail, and added new features to make your journey from burger flipper to food truck mogul even more exciting.

This version is our biggest yet, and we couldn’t have done it without you—our amazing community of grillers who’ve been with us since day one. Your feedback, support, and passion have driven us to make Grill on Wheels the best it can be. Thank you for sticking with us through all the preheats and taste tests. This milestone is as much yours as it is ours.

Now, it’s time to fire up those grills, hit the road, and serve up some deliciousness like never before. We can’t wait to see you all in the game!

Happy grilling,
The Grill on Wheels Team

#grillonwheels #vr #vrgames
